column5: Dave Mercer, Canada's fishing funny-man, and all around nice guy, will be at Chapters this coming Sunday for a book signing! let's all show him how crazy Barrie is about fishing!!
If I lived in Barrie...I'd go. If I could read...I'd get his book. Does it have lots of pictures?  (My previous post would not have made any more sense then this one does after the O.P. edited it.)
If you don't show up, Kenzy's gonna Merder you.....
The title originally said Mer"d"er not Mercer.
